answers.answer: Way to go!!!! :) you can do it!!!I gained 75lbs through my first pregnancy but mine was all water weight from the preeclampsia. The week before they took my son out i gained 35lbs just in three days. I looked like a balloon ready to pop. Lol.

question: So I figured I was done on here turns out I just can't stay away -.- lol but anyways I've lost 23 lbs in 12 days! My doctor told me I was retaining a lot of water but man oh man. Lol only 50 lbs to go now!
title: cant stay away
